pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, August 31, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at Rideau Hall.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a swearing-in ceremony.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 9:15 a.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery and are asked to confirm their attendance with the Rideau Hall Press Office in advance.
  • Media contact: Natalie.BabinDufresne@gg.ca

10:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a brief media availability.

Queen’s Entrance
Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
